text: Vincent Gardenia (January 7, 1920 â€“ December 9, 1992) was an Italian-American actor. He was born in Ercolano, Italy. In 1955, Gardenia was in Gunsmoke. Vincent Gardenia played Frank Lorenzo in the famous 1970s sitcom All in the Family. In 1990, Vincent won the Outstanding Supporting Actor award. Gardenia died on December 9, 1992 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania at the age of 72. == Other websites == * Category:1920 births Category:1992 deaths Category:American television actors Category:Italian television actors
title: Vincent Gardenia
